blue_text: The PROMODEL modeling agency is very interested in new models. Please only fill out the form if you meet these criteria: Are you between 8 and 24 years old? Are you over 170 cm tall? Is your waist up to 60 cm, your hips up to 90 cm? Please send photos of your face without makeup.
red_text: NOTE! WE DO NOT CONSIDER APPLICATIONS WITH PHOTOS IN WHICH THE FACE IS NOT SEEN, AND ALSO APPLICATIONS WITH GROUP PHOTOS.
about1: Our staff is highly qualified and has a wealth of experience. Professionalism and knowledge of management allows us to achieve all the client's requirements.
about2: International modeling agency 'ProModel' was founded in 2007 in Tashkent. It has branches in cities such as Kuala Lumpur, Hong Kong, Almaty, Shymkent, Kiev, Bishkek and Moscow. The young company successfully advertised itself in the service industry, occupying the top bar among the modeling agencies in Uzbekistan. The agency has an extensive database of models. Girls, boys, children, including professional actors. Among them are the winners of prestigious professional modeling contests, repeated participants in fashion shows, faces of famous companies and glossy magazines.
about3: Modeling agency 'ProModel' works in all areas of the modeling business:
about4: Fashion: filming, fashion show, art, fashion
about5: Promotion: shooting advertising, photo, video, exhibitions, promotions
about6: TV and ADV: shooting for advertising of printed materials, TV, Internet
about7: Fashion: filming, fashion show, art, fashion
about8: We are pleased to offer you mutually beneficial cooperation in the modeling industry
about9: By providing you with the services and models of our agency for participation in international projects.
about10: Modeling agency PROMODEL is proud of filming with the best glossy magazines and designers:
